entry.tran: 弥赛亚(上帝派去拯救犹太人民的国王)
entry.def: For Jews, the Messiah is the King of the Jews, who will be sent to them by God.
For Christians, the Messiah is Jesus Christ.

If you refer to someone as a messiah, you mean that they are expected to do wonderful things, especially to rescue people from a very difficult or dangerous situation, or that they are thought to have done these things.

example.ex: People saw Mandela as their messiah...
example.tran: 人民把曼德拉看作他们的大救星。

example.ex: He was somehow destined to become a rock messiah.
example.tran: 冥冥之中，他注定会成为摇滚乐的救世主。
